help:
__**3DS Family Help Commands**__
*`.3ds start` - Gives the 2 basic guides*
*`.3ds b9s` - Guide to installing boot9strap with Un-safe Mode*
*`.3ds final` - Finalizing Setup (good to get files you may have missed)*
*`.3ds pm` - Guide to updating luma incase you accidentally updated the 3ds first*
*`.3ds twl` - Gives a QR code to install TwiLight Menu++*
*`.3ds id0` - Displays image explaining id0*
*`.3ds root` - Displays image explaining root*
*`.3ds cart` - Displays image explaining carts*
*`.3ds manualupdate` - manually update LumaCFW*
start: <https://3ds.hacks.guide/get-started> Only pick an exploit for your console!
pm:
Manually Updating Luma3DS
A guide for manually updating Luma3ds. This is necessary if you receive the "Failed to apply 1 Firm patch(es)" or "pm" errors.
https://gist.github.com/lilyuwuu/3a7ba3dcd2476e6b5f4b6f66fa173bd6
twl: use universal updater (<https://universal-team.net/projects/universal-updater.html>) to download TWL menu
root2: root: its the topmost directory of a SD / Flash drive, so if you plug it into your computer and open the drive, that is the 'root' of the drive
default: No command supplied! Type `.3ds help` for a list of subcommands!
